level.text: A member of the Commission shall not knowingly participate in any action of the Commission if such member, or the member's spouse or domestic partner, parent, grandparent, child, grandchild, brother, sister, uncle, aunt, cousin, nephew or niece, has a financial or business interest in the action.
A member shall not be liable in damages or court costs for any action of the Commission performed in good faith.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 17-231, in subsec. (a), substituted "spouse or domestic partner" for "spouse".

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-20
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-20, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 3-601.
